content:
The provided document is part of Panda3D's sample program documentation for the Distortion effect. It includes instructions on installing Panda3D and locating sample programs for different operating systems, describes the shader effect created by rendering the screen into a texture, and provides navigation back to the list of samples.

```plaintext
This document explains how to access and run the "Distortion" sample program in Panda3D, detailing installation steps, platform-specific locations, an explanation of the shader effect, and navigation within the documentation.
```

Sample Programs: Distortion

To run a sample program, you need to install Panda3D. If you're a Windows user, you'll find the sample programs in your start menu. If you're a Linux user, you'll find the sample programs in /usr/share/panda3d.

Screenshots

Explanation

Creates an interesting shader effect where the entire screen is rendered into a texture.
